lore: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to many that Singed has lost all sense of humanity, leaving a toxic trail of misery and terror in his wake.
title: the Mad Chemist
blurb: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to...
allytips: Poison Trail is very effective at farming and harassing, allowing Singed to dominate the flow of whatever lane he's in.
Use Insanity Potion to trick your opponents into chasing you through your Poison Trail.
Flinging enemies into your tower can deal heavy amounts of damage to them.

passive.name: Noxious Slipstream
passive.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

enemytips: Keep your distance to avoid being Flung back into Singed's allies.
Singed needs to run close to your team to be effective. Try to take advantage of this by using crowd control effects on him while attacking his allies.
Be careful when chasing Singed. He's very difficult to bring down, and can leave his Poison Trail to damage you in your pursuit.
name: Singed

spells.name: Poison Trail
spells.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*4 }}) magic damage per second.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*4 }}) magic damage per second.

spells.name: Mega Adhesive
spells.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
spells.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

spells.name: Fling
spells.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spells.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Insanity Potion
spells.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.
